thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Shirley

author: Shirley
title: Shirley
text:
Of the 3 companies suggested to Quote: for solar 2 came. The other tried to change the arranged appointment to a day early. Then rang next morning and cancelled. I then cancelled this one altogether. The first company to Quote: was not as thorough as the 2nd one. Went with the 2nd Quote: as I felt they were more experienced and thorough in what they did. Plus I felt their after sale service would be less of a hassle.
Finn Peacock was excellent in follow up to make sure I had sufficient information to make a decision on panels plus also checked if the 3 suggested to Quote: had contacted me. Anyone looking for information on solar panels etc, start with Finn's review first. You even get a check list to check off how each of the companies have Quote: d.
